title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes does not use busy cursor
description: When updating the checked state of the table in Export Zip, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case). During this process, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the application is busy.
OB: Currently, there is no busy cursor shown while updating the checked state of the table.
EB: A busy cursor should be displayed while updating the checked state of the table in Export Zip.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the Export Zip feature. 2. Perform actions that trigger the update of the checked state of the table. Observe that no busy cursor is displayed during this process.
